entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
